articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Leader of Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on December 17.
					 The message extended deep sympathy to Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people on the 4th anniversary of demise of Comrade Kim Jong Il, outstanding state political activist of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life to promoting the people's well-being and strengthening the economic and defensive potentialities of the DPRK, the message said.
					
					 The chairman said he shares sorrow with Kim Jong Un on the day of painful loss to the DPRK and its people in their life.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people prosperity and successes in all aspects for the country's culture, humanitarianism and regional development.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Is Natural Outcome: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Is Natural Outcome: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Former U.S. Secretary of Defense Perry at a recent interview confessed that Washington had planned an air strike at the Nyongbyon nuclear complex of the DPRK in 1994.
					 This means that the U.S. has long attempted to carry out its scenario for a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 Washington has spurred its preparations for a nuclear war against the DPRK, watching for a chance of invasion.
					
					 The war-like forces of the U.S. shaped a risky operational scenario so-called "surgical strike" targeting key strategic installations in the DPRK and tried to apply it to their operation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Slandering the DPRK as part of an "axis of evil", the U.S. listed it as a target of preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 Under a variety of operation plans such as OPLAN 5029, OPLAN 5030 and OPLAN 5012 the U.S. has masterminded joint war drills against the DPRK every year for decades under various codenames, namely Focus Retina, Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, RSOI, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 The U.S. has massively brought strategic nuclear war hardware to its bases in south Korea from its mainland and other overseas military bases, which is totally aimed to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, not to merely irritate it.
					
					 To cope with the nuclear threat coming from the U.S, the DPRK has bolstered up its defence capabilities with the nuclear deterrent as a pivot under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The on-going situation proves how just the DPRK was when it pressed for the strategy.
					
					 The DPRK has equipped itself with nuclear deterrent and strategic and tactical rocket forces and Washington's attempt at a strike at Pyongyang resulted in making the latter being capable of striking the U.S. mainland.
					
					 By dint of the Songun policy and the powerful nuclear deterrence, the DPRK firmly defended its destiny and dignity despite the outsiders' intervention and aggression moves and all challenges against reunification.
					
					 But for the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent for self-defence, the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity would have long been thrown into an appalling confusion like war-torn Mideast now when power politics rule the roost and injustice violates justice and truth.
					
					 Entirely just is the road of Songun (army-first) taken by the DPRK and its non-stop development of nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Nature behind Its Hypocritical Call for Dialogue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Nature behind Its Hypocritical Call for Dialogue 
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. together with its followers made absurd remarks on denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and resumption of the six-party talks, by mixing the issue of concluding a peace treaty with the denuclearization issue. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article in this regard: 
					
					 Talking about "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK and the "need to observe international law and norms", the U.S. called for an important advance in the denuclearization before replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. ruling quarters speak in public they pursue no hostile policy toward the DPRK but are interested in peace and dialogue of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It is necessary to disclose again the deceptive nature of the U.S. talk about dialogue, given that the hostile forces mislead the public opinion over the issue of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to remove the danger of war, defuse the tension and create a peaceful climate on the peninsula but all in vain. 
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. talk about the "need to observe international law and norms" is its black-hearted intention to isolate and stifle the DPRK in the international community. 
					
					 It is a sheer lie that the U.S. does not pursue hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 All the sanctions against the DPRK imposed by the U.S. so far stem from its inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the DPRK and the ensuing hostile policy. 
					
					 The U.S. should not resort to a sleight of hand but withdraw the hostile policy to the DPRK of its own accord and come out for dialogue for the peace treaty as early as possible.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules S. Korean Military Warmongers' Confrontational Hysteria against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules S. Korean Military Warmongers' Confrontational Hysteria against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers at the recent "leading commanding officers' meeting of the army" made bluffing that they "would deter the north from making various provocations and strongly react to them" by wild guess that the "north will continue to conduct nuclear and ballistic missile tests next year, too".
					 Minju Joson Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than a hysterical fit of psychopaths who are steeped in inveterate repugnancy toward compatriots to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 This is aimed to gloss over the tattered "story of provocation by the north in October" and justify the north-targeted war preparations in a bid to realize their daydream to stifle the DPRK at any cost by force of arms backed by their U.S. master.
					
					 To this end, the warmongers are loudly spreading the story of "provocation by the north" pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward it and have gone desperate in their moves to intentionally deteriorate the situation of the region.
					
					 It is their sinister intention to justify the war moves against the north under the pretext of escalating the situation and take an active part in the criminal U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance in a bid to act as a shock brigade for the second Korean war.
					
					 Clear evidence is their recent act of joining the U.S. in their call for the "operation to cope with missile".
					
					 They had better stop acting rashly, clearly understanding the more recklessly they work to escalate the confrontation with compatriots while talking about the "provocation by the north", the more glaringly they will reveal their sinister nature as a war servant who cling to the coat-tail of their U.S. master.

articles.title: KCTU Goes on General Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCTU Goes on General Strike in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) went on a general strike in unison in 12 regions on Dec. 16 in protest against the fascist suppression and unpopular rule by the conservative ruling quarters.
					 The general strike involved 150 000 persons including the unionists of 26 companies under the KCTU.
					
					 About 5 000 unionists from Seoul, Inchon, Kyonggi Province and south Korean Kangwon Province rallied near the building of the "National Assembly" in Seoul before going into the general strike.
					
					 The senior vice-chairman of the KCTU said at the rally it is time to stand up against the authorities with action and struggle now that they have reached the extremity in their moves for the retrogressive revision of the labor law.
					
					 The representatives of the metal workers trade union, the public transport trade union, the healthcare service trade union and other industrial trade unions declared in their speeches that many industrial trade unions turned out in the general strike, contrary to the authorities' prediction that the KCTU would no longer wage a struggle with its chairman detained.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					 The participants marched to the building of the economists association, denouncing the regime and plutocrats for seeking the retrogressive revision of the labor law.
					
					 Timed to coincide with it, Pusan and Ulsan headquarters of the KCTU held similar rallies.
					
					 The regional headquarters of the KCTU held demos and conducted information services following the rallies in Inchon, Kwangju, Taejon, Taegu, Jeju Island, North Chungchong, South Kyongsang and North Jolla provinces.

articles.title: European Trade Union Federation Denounces S. Korean Regime for Unreasonable Crackdown on Workers
articles.content:
European Trade Union Federation Denounces S. Korean Regime for Unreasonable Crackdown on Workers
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The European Trade Union Federation expressed concern over the south Korean regime's unreasonable crackdown on trade unionists, according to the south Korean KBS on Dec. 17.
					 The organization slammed the violent crackdown on workers and core members of the trade unions of south Korea who staged actions against the enactment of law infringing on the right to labor. 
					
					 The body urged the Executive Committee of the EU to pay heed to the unreasonable crackdown. 
					
					 It conveyed a letter reflecting the fact to the EU Executive Committee.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution's Fascist Action Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution's Fascist Action Denounced 
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean fascist prosecution suggested 3 years' imprisonment and 3 years' suspension of qualification for Pak Chang Suk, the pro-reunification activist on December 14, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 At a trial at the Suwon District Court the prosecution inflicted this punishment, charging Pak acted as an adviser and a member of the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and that Pak's act of sharing information about the north on internet is in violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 Pak strongly called for the abolition of the SL.
					
					 Pak's counsel maintained most of the information branded as "literature benefiting enemy" are what have been posted on websites, holding this can not be a crime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is What Keeps Our People Alive" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its website on December 10.
					 The work published on November 14, Juche 81 (1992) deals with the necessity to defend the world socialist movement and the cause of socialism and indicates the tasks for defending and advancing the cause of socialism and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Events for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in different countries from Dec. 8 to 11 on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of his demise.
					 A seminar was held in Bulgaria.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, Bulgarian Communists' Party, Bulgarian Communists Union, Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia and the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and masses.
					
					 The president of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il passed away but the exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence would shine forever along with history.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 A book and photo exhibition, seminar and film show took place in Germany.
					
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were works of Kim Jong Un and photos showing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany noted that Kim Jong Il consolidated the national power for self-defense as firm as a rock and developed the Korean People's Army into the army of the leader, party and people and, therefore, the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces dare not to provoke the DPRK.
					
					 Seminars were held by the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. and a machine technology company of Indonesia.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Various events took place on the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work in Switzerland, a briefing on Marshal Kim Jong Un's work in DR Congo, round-table talks and book exhibition in Iran and a film show in Angola from Dec. 5 to 10.
					
					 Displayed at the venues were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and Korean books.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee cited the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries".
					
					 Glorious history of the Korean revolution has been given steady continuity thanks to the policy of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of noblest revolutionary comradeship and moral obligation, the policy of loving the people, the chairman noted, and went on:
					
					 We will introduce and give wide publicity to the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man and to the proud history of the Korean revolution emerging victorious by dint of revolutionary moral obligation.
					
					 A deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo briefed on Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism". He said Kim Jong Un is glorifying the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by catapulting the national power and dignity of the DPRK to the centre stage of the world with his Songun politics.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm said Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the preceding leaders though Kim Jong Il passed away.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted articles on its website on Dec. 10 on the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The articles praising the revolutionary exploits and career of Kim Jong Il were posted on the website with photos of him inspecting units of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Spanish Political Figure Pays Homage to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Spanish Political Figure Pays Homage to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain made public a statement on Dec. 13 on the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In the statement the general secretary paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il on the anniversary.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a leader of the people as he regarded them as his teacher and dedicated his whole life to their happiness just the way President Kim Il Sung did when leading the revolution, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 The Korean people absolutely trusted him and faithfully upheld his leadership.
					
					 Such loyalty to him can hardly be understood by the politicians in the capitalist countries where the popular masses are subject to exploitation and oppression.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and pursued original Songun politics, making sure the people's army played a vanguard role in all fields of socialist construction.
					
					 The Korean people will always win victory, resolutely foiling the U.S. imperialist aggression moves, and Korean-style socialism will give off rays as the beacon of humankind to the whole world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de V. V. Zhirinovsky
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de V. V. Zhirinovsky
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 17 el presidente del Partido Democratico Liberal de Rusia, V. V. Zhirinovsky.
					  La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					  Respetado camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					  Expreso mi profundo consuelo a usted y a todo el pueblo coreano con motivo del IV aniversario del fallecimiento del camarada Kim Jong Il, destacado activista estatal y politico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El camarada Kim Jong Il dedico toda su vida a fomentar el bienestar del pueblo y fortalecer la potencialidad economica y defensiva de la RPDC.
					
					  Comparto la tristeza con usted este dia de dolorosa perdida en la vida de la RPDC y el pueblo.
					
					  Respetado camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					  Deseo a Usted buena salud y felicidad y al pueblo coreano la prosperidad y exitos en todos los dominios de la cultura del pais, el humanitarismo y el desarrollo regional.

articles.title: Son justos politica de Songun y fortalecimiento de disuasivo nuclear, apunta ACNC
articles.content:
Son justos politica de Songun y fortalecimiento de disuasivo nuclear, apunta ACNC
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En una reciente entrevista, el ex secretario de Defensa de Estados Unidos, Perry, confeso que en 1994 su pais tenia el plan de ataque aereo contra las instalaciones nucleares de Nyongbyon de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Esto evidencia que el plan de ataque preventivo anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se puso en funcionamiento ya desde hace mucho tiempo. 
					
					Hasta la fecha EE.UU. no abandono ni un momento la ambicion de agresion a la RPDC sino vino dando acicate a los preparativos de guerra nuclear acechando la oportunidad de agredirla. 
					
					Los aventureros belicos norteamericanos trazaron el plan operacional de "ataque quirurgico", cuya meta es asestar el ataque preventivo a los importantes objetos estrategicos de la RPDC, y trataron de aplicar el modo de operacion aventurera en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					No ocultaron la hostilidad a la RPDC definiendola como "eje del mal" e incluyendola en la lista de blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					Perfeccionaron por tipos los guiones de guerra como "OPLAN 5029", "OPLAN 5030" y "OPLAN 5012" a fin de atacar con armas a la RPDC. Y durante varios decenios vinieron desarrollando anualmente los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de toda indole cambiando sus nombres como Focus Retina, Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, RSOI, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle y Ulji Freedom Guardian. 
					
					EE.UU. introduce en el Sur de Corea enormes medios de ataque estrategicos desde su propio territorio y sus bases militares ultramarinas ejerciendo la amenaza y chantaje abiertos sobre la RPDC y agravando intencionalmente la situacion. Su verdadera intencion no es asustar a nuestro pais sino provocar la guerra nuclear. 
					
					EE.UU. es el acarreador del peligro de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana y autor que provoca y obstaculiza la solucion del problema nuclear. 
					
					La realidad comprueba que es muy justa el hecho de que la RPDC ha venido consolidando la capacidad de autodefensa nacional basada en el disuasivo nuclear enarbolando la bandera del Songun. 
					
					El imprudente chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. nos empujo a la posesion del disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa, su alboroto de amenaza de misil nos hizo organizar el fuerte colectivo de ataque dotado de cohetes estrategicos y tacticos, y su intento de "ataque a Pyongyang" nos impulso a disponer de la capacidad de ataque preciso al territorio estadounidense. 
					
					Con la politica de Songun y el fuerte disuasivo nuclear hemos defendido el destino y dignidad de la nacion desde la intervencion y las maniobras de agresion de las fuerzas extranjeras y frustrado todos los desafios anti-reunificacion. 
					
					Si no hubieramos contado con el fuerte disuasivo nuclear en la actualidad en que predomina el despotismo a base de la fuerza y se ven pisoteadas la justicia y la veracidad, ya habrian sufrido la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno los desastres de guerra como el Medio Oriente y se habria encontrado en el callejon sin salida la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Son mil veces justos la politica de Songun y el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa, optados por el pueblo coreano.
